definition: lit. doesn't hurt, doesn't tickle (idiom); sth is wrong, but not quite sure what/fig. not getting to any matter of substance/scratching the surface/superficial/perfunctory

sentences.english: He made some perfunctory remarks at the meeting.
sentences.chinese: 他在會上講了些不痛不癢的話。

definition: dumbstruck and unable to reply (idiom); left speechless/at a loss for words
unable to sit or stand still (out of nervousness etc) (idiom)
lit. cannot rest or eat in peace (idiom)/fig. extremely worried and troubled
to submit to humiliation (idiom); to suffer in silence/to swallow one's anger/to grin and bear it
to force someone to do something
righteous indignation fills one's breast (idiom); to feel indignant at injustice
to invent crazy nonsense/to cook up (excuses)/to talk at random/wild babble
lit. the soul flies away and scatters (idiom)/fig. to be frightened stiff/spooked out of one's mind/terror-stricken
to reveal the cloven foot (idiom); to unmask one's true nature/to give the game away
